name: Project Grove: Chapter 1
description:
Project Grove is an episodic puzzle platformer following legendary alchemist Edric and his robot sidekick L-P1N on their quest to cure The Great Rot. Set in the vast forest of Dacrima, you explore its secrets; navigating dangerous terrain, collecting and experimenting with exotic flora.

CHAPTER 1: WELCOME TO DACRIMA

Steam-powered technology has given rise to unprecedented feats of alchemy. During this great prosperity, an epidemic called “The Great Rot” has hit the Empire. Potentium, a robotics company, proposes a location for a cure: Dacrima, the rumoured birthplace of magic and its mythical Grove.

JUMP ON YOUR BEST FRIEND'S HEAD

L-P1N is your travel guide, best friend and placeable platform. Cross crevasses and dodge descending boulders. Jumping on your best friend's head has never been so useful.

DISCOVER THE CURE

As a legendary alchemist, you'll collect exotic ingredients from magical flora and combine them into potions. Each one grants new abilities and skills; affecting you, L-P1N and your surroundings. Cast magical fireworks, ride water jets across the sky in enchanted bubbles and more!

QUINTESSENTIAL BRITISH HUMOUR

A tale of a treacherous expedition, inspired by Monty Python, which builds trust in two unlikely friends overcoming conflict and finding humour in the darkest of places.

SURREAL SIDE QUESTS

From the curious to the bizarre. Need some new feathers for your bed? How about an abusive house plant?

BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY

Dacriman puzzles can be solved in multiple ways with different potions. Choose your favourite loadout and get exploring!
